ExpSyntax.val: 'All,Not Due,1-30 Days,31-60 Days,61-90 Days,91-120 Days,Over 120 Days'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.Comments AS 'Remarks', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS 'Number' FROM OINV T0 WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4)
UNION ALL SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.Comments AS 'Remarks', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal*(-1) AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate*(-1) AS 'Amount Paid', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS 'Number' FROM ORIN T0 JOIN RIN1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4)
UNION ALL --Sub Total SELECT [Customer Code], [Customer Name], 'SUBTOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Remarks', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Document Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM([Invoice Amount]) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM([Amount Paid]) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM([Outstanding Balance]) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', SUM([Not Due]), SUM([1-30 Days]) AS '1-30 Days', SUM([30-60 Days]) AS '30-60 Days', SUM([60-90 Days]) AS '60-90 Days', SUM([90-120 Days]) AS '90-120 Days', SUM([Over 120 Days]) AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS Number FROM (SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.DocTotal*(-1) AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate*(-1) AS 'Amount Paid', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM ORIN T0 JOIN RIN1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) UNION ALL SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM OINV T0 WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) )x GROUP BY [Customer Code],[Customer Name]
UNION ALL -- Total SELECT NULL AS 'Customer Code', 'TOTAL' AS 'Customer Name', 'TOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Remarks', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Transaction Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM(x.inv) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(x.paid) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM(x.ob) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', NULL AS 'Not Due', NULL AS '0-30 Days', NULL AS '30-60 Days', NULL AS '60-90 Days', NULL AS '90-120 Days', NULL AS 'Over 120 Days', 2 AS 'Number' FROM (SELECT SUM(T0.DocTotal)*(-1) AS inv, SUM(T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS paid, SUM(T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS ob From ORIN T0 Join Rin1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry Where T0.DocStatus ='O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(T0.DocTotal) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(T0.PaidToDate) AS 'AmountPaid', SUM(T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) AS 'Outstanding Balance' From OINV T0 Where T0.DocStatus ='O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) )x ORDER BY Number,CardCode,objtype,DocNum,T0.DocDueDate ASC

SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.Comments AS 'Remarks', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS 'Number' FROM OINV T0 WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4)
UNION ALL SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.Comments AS 'Remarks', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal*(-1) AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate*(-1) AS 'Amount Paid', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS 'Number' FROM ORIN T0 JOIN RIN1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4)
UNION ALL --Sub Total SELECT [Customer Code], [Customer Name], 'SUBTOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Remarks', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Document Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM([Invoice Amount]) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM([Amount Paid]) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM([Outstanding Balance]) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', SUM([Not Due]), SUM([1-30 Days]) AS '1-30 Days', SUM([30-60 Days]) AS '30-60 Days', SUM([60-90 Days]) AS '60-90 Days', SUM([90-120 Days]) AS '90-120 Days', SUM([Over 120 Days]) AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS Number FROM (SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.DocTotal*(-1) AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate*(-1) AS 'Amount Paid', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM ORIN T0 JOIN RIN1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) UNION ALL SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM OINV T0 WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) )x GROUP BY [Customer Code],[Customer Name] HAVING COUNT(0)>1
UNION ALL -- Total SELECT NULL AS 'Customer Code', 'TOTAL' AS 'Customer Name', 'TOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Remarks', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Transaction Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM(x.inv) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(x.paid) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM(x.ob) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', NULL AS 'Not Due', NULL AS '0-30 Days', NULL AS '30-60 Days', NULL AS '60-90 Days', NULL AS '90-120 Days', NULL AS 'Over 120 Days', 2 AS 'Number' FROM (SELECT SUM(T0.DocTotal)*(-1) AS inv, SUM(T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS paid, SUM(T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate)*(-1) AS ob From ORIN T0 Join Rin1 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry Where T0.DocStatus ='O' AND T1.BaseType = -1 and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(T0.DocTotal) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(T0.PaidToDate) AS 'AmountPaid', SUM(T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) AS 'Outstanding Balance' From OINV T0 Where T0.DocStatus ='O' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4) )x ORDER BY Number,CardCode,objtype,DocNum,T0.DocDueDate ASC

select sum(DocTotal) Total from ( select cardname,DocEntry,DocTotal-RoundDif DocTotal from oinv where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' and Canceled='N' union all select cardname,DocEntry,DocTotal*-1 from orin where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' and Canceled='N' union all SELECT cardname,d.DocEntry,d.SumApplied*-1 FROM RCT2 d, ORCT h where h.DocEntry=d.DocNum and h.Canceled='N' and (d.InvType=203 and d.DocEntry not in( select BaseAbs from inv9 union all select BaseAbs from rin9 ) or d.InvType<>203) and DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' )x

SELECT [Customer Code],[Customer Name],SUM(OUTSTANDING) outstanding FROM ( select y.[Customer Code],y.[Customer Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding*y.Rate OUTSTANDING,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ar_history_view where [customer Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ar_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Customer Code] is not null :3 )A GROUP BY [Customer Code],[Customer Name] order by SUM(OUTSTANDING) desc

select x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding*y.Rate OUTSTANDING,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ar_history_view where [customer code]=':1' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ar_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Customer Code] is not null :3

SELECT SUM(OUTSTANDING) outstanding FROM ( select y.[Customer Code],y.[Customer Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding*y.Rate OUTSTANDING,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ar_history_view where [customer Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ar_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Customer Code] is not null :3 )A

select y.[Customer Code],y.[Customer Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,y.[Invoice Amount]*y.Rate Inv_Amount,x.outstanding*y.Rate OUTSTANDING,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.gcm_id,v.Comments from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ar_history_view where [customer Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ar_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join ALLDOC_VIEW v on v.OBJTYPE=x.[Object Type] and v.DOCNUM=x.[Document Number] left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Customer Code] is not null :3 order by y.[Customer Code]
